job_title: Senior VAPT Engineer – Cybersecurity & Payment Security
job_description:
Senior VAPT Engineer – Cybersecurity & Payment Security

Location: WFO-Infopark, Kochi Experience Required: 7+ Years

Position Overview

We are seeking an experienced Senior VAPT Engineer with expertise in application, network, cloud, and payment security. This role leads vulnerability assessment and penetration testing (VAPT) engagements across enterprise and fintech environments, ensuring systems and payment infrastructures are resilient against cyber threats. The position is client-facing, requiring the ability to translate technical findings into business and risk insights.

Key Responsibilities

VAPT & Security Assessment - Lead end-to-end VAPT engagements (scoping, execution, reporting, remediation). - Perform black-box, grey-box, and white-box penetration testing on web apps, APIs, networks, cloud, and infrastructure. - Conduct advanced manual testing aligned with OWASP Top 10, SANS Top 25, and MITRE ATT&CK. - Design threat models and attack scenarios using current threat intelligence.

Payment Security & FinTech Testing - Perform protocol-level penetration testing on ISO 8583 financial messaging (MTI manipulation, bitmap tampering, replay attacks). - Test payment infrastructure (Payment Switches, HSMs, POS systems, gateways). - Assess payment APIs (REST/GraphQL) for BOLA, mass assignment, and transaction flow abuse. - Review cryptographic implementations (AES, RSA, tokenization, key management) for PAN/CVV protection. - Support PCI DSS v4.0 compliance via quarterly scans and annual penetration testing of the CDE. - Simulate fraud scenarios (double-spend, refund abuse, replay attacks) with Risk teams.

Cloud, Mobile & Automation - Conduct security assessments on AWS, Azure, GCP (IAM, serverless components). - Test Android/iOS apps (SSL pinning bypass, root/jailbreak checks). - Develop custom scripts/tools using Python, Bash, PowerShell, or Go for automation.

Reporting & Client Communication - Produce clear VAPT reports with actionable remediation and secure-by-design recommendations. - Present findings to technical teams and senior stakeholders. - Act as a trusted security advisor to clients and internal teams.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 7+ years in VAPT, penetration testing, or security consulting.
  • Expertise in application, network, cloud, and payment security.
  • Deep understanding of ISO 8583, OWASP Top 10, and PCI DSS.
  • Proficiency with tools: Burp Suite, Nessus, Nmap, Metasploit, Wireshark, OpenVAS.
  • Experience with cloud security (AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerized environments.
  • Strong scripting/automation skills.
  • Excellent documentation and stakeholder communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Certifications: OSCP, OSCE, CPENT, GPEN, CREST, CISSP, CEH.
  • Knowledge of PCI QSA processes or ISO 8583 fundamentals.
  • Experience with fintech platforms, payment gateways (e.g., Stripe), and 3DS authentication.
  • Prior consulting or client-facing experience.

Contact: Share your resume at lavanya.a@arttechgroup.com
summary: Lead VAPT and payment security testing for enterprise and fintech clients. Requires 7+ years of experience in cybersecurity with expertise in cloud and application security.

job_description:
About the Company

Maple Tech Space (MTS) is an IT consultancy firm based in Canada, established in 2020 with a head office in Ontario and offshore operations in Kerala, India. Specializing in IT consulting, digital marketing, app development, and web services, MTS has successfully launched three products in the Canadian market and serves over 1,000 clients.

AgentRoof, a fast-growing PropTech division under MTS, empowers real estate professionals in Canada and the US with websites, CRM, lead generation, and social media marketing solutions. We are expanding our sales team and seeking experienced Business Development Managers to drive growth in the North American market.

Role & Responsibilities

As a Business Development Manager (BDM), you will: - Cold Calling & Prospecting: Make 60–80 outbound calls daily to target real estate agents and brokerages in the US/Canada. - Pitching & Presentations: Deliver impactful product pitches (websites, CRM, marketing services) and highlight value propositions. - Demo Management: Schedule, conduct, and close product demos with prospective clients. - Lead Conversion: Achieve a minimum of 15 client sign-ups monthly. - Client Retention: Build strong relationships, upsell/cross-sell services, and ensure renewals. - CRM Management: Maintain lead pipelines, track activities, and follow up consistently. - Market Insights: Gather client objections, competitor intelligence, and provide feedback to refine sales strategies.

Requirements

  • Experience: 2+ years in outbound sales/business development for US/Canada clients (SaaS or Real Estate experience preferred).
  • Skills: Proficiency in cold calling, product pitching, negotiation, and closing deals.
  • Language Proficiency: Mandatory English (spoken/written). Knowledge of Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, or other regional languages is a plus.
  • Personality: Aggressive, persuasive, and energetic with excellent convincing power.
  • Performance: Proven ability to meet/exceed monthly sales targets.
  • Tech-Savvy: Familiarity with CRM tools, lead management, and virtual demo platforms (Zoom/Meet).
  • Flexibility: Willingness to work night shifts aligned with North American time zones.

What We Offer

  • Competitive salary + performance-based incentives.
  • Opportunity to work with a high-growth PropTech brand in Canada/US markets.
  • Fast career progression for high performers.
  • Work-from-home flexibility with international exposure.
  • Dynamic and young team culture.

Contact: Apply by sharing your updated resume at careers@mapletechspace.com.

Location: Work from Home (Night Shift: 6:00 PM – 3:00 AM IST) Industry: Real Estate Tech (Websites, CRM, Lead Generation & Marketing Services)

  • Managing team delivery
  • Client communication and reporting
  • Ensuring operational and budget discipline

Key Responsibilities

  1. Social Media Strategy
  2. Develop platform-wise strategies aligned with client goals.
  3. Define monthly/quarterly content themes, campaigns, formats, and posting frequency.
  4. Identify growth opportunities via analytics, trends, and competitor analysis.
  5. Provide strategic direction to content/creative teams.

  6. Continuously optimize strategies based on performance insights.

  7. Content & Creative Team Management

  8. Lead Content Writers and Creative Designers.
  9. Break down strategy into task briefs and distribute responsibilities.
  10. Review/approve all content copies and creatives.

  11. Maintain brand consistency, tone, and quality.

  12. Client Communication & Relationship Management

  13. Act as the single point of contact for social media-related client communication.
  14. Conduct strategy discussions, review calls, and performance meetings.
  15. Present strategies, calendars, reports, and optimization plans.

  16. Handle client feedback and align internal teams.

  17. Social Media Planning & Execution Oversight

  18. Ensure timely planning, review, and sharing of monthly calendars.
  19. Monitor on-time approval, scheduling, and publishing of posts.

  20. Maintain platform best practices across Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.

  21. Cross-Team Collaboration

  22. Collaborate with SEO, Paid Ads, and Web Development teams.
  23. Coordinate creatives, landing pages, blogs, and ad content.

  24. Ensure interdepartmental clarity and collaboration.

  25. Reporting, Analysis & Optimization

  26. Analyze performance metrics (engagement, reach, conversions).
  27. Prepare monthly reports with insights and recommendations.
  28. Track improvements and communicate impact to clients.

  29. Use data to refine content formats and strategies.

  30. Time, Budget & Operations Management

  31. Ensure accurate time logging in Asana (or assigned platform).
  32. Coordinate with Finance to track client budgets and planned hours.
  33. Flag inefficiencies and ensure efficient resource utilization.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 2-4 years of experience in Social Media Strategy & Management
  • Strong team leadership in content/creative roles
  • Proven data-driven strategy creation
  • Excellent client communication/presentation skills
  • Experience with project management tools (Asana, ClickUp)
  • Analytical mindset with reporting expertise
  • Ability to balance strategy, people management, and operations

Key Success Metrics (KPIs)

  • Quality/effectiveness of social media strategies
  • Client satisfaction and retention
  • Consistency/quality of content output
  • Timely delivery of calendars, posts, and reports
  • Month-on-month performance improvement
  • Team efficiency and accurate hour tracking

Why This Role Matters

This role drives growth through high ownership of strategy, client relationships, and team operations. It directly impacts client results and agency reputation, with a clear path to senior leadership roles.
